user.title: Set up UGREEN NAS
user.description: Enter the connection details for your UGREEN NAS.

data_description.ugreen_host: The IP address or hostname of your UGREEN NAS (e.g. 192.168.1.100).
data_description.ugreen_port: Port used for the connection (default: 9999 for HTTP, 9443 for HTTPS).
data_description.password: Your NAS admin password (no special characters – UGOS bug!).

zeroconf.title: UGREEN NAS discovered
zeroconf.description: A UGREEN NAS was automatically discovered on the network. Enter your credentials to add it.

error.cannot_connect: Connection failed. Please check the IP address, port and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Connection error or invalid credentials. Please check network and user settings.

abort.already_configured: This UGREEN NAS is already configured.

init.title: UGREEN NAS settings
init.description: Change the settings for your UGREEN NAS. The integration will be reloaded after saving.

data.ws_interval: (Advanced – recommended to keep) Keepalive interval / API pings

data_description.device_name: Change the device name as it is shown in Home Assistant.
data_description.ugreen_host: The IP address or hostname of your UGREEN NAS.
data_description.ugreen_port: Port used for the connection (default: 9999 for HTTP, 9443 for HTTPS).
data_description.password: Your NAS admin password (no special characters – UGOS bug!).
data_description.state_interval: How often should frequently changing values be polled? (5s)
data_description.config_interval: How often should less frequently changing values be polled? (60s)
data_description.ws_interval: How often should an API keepalive ping be sent via WebSocket? (20s)
data_description.use_https: Use an encrypted HTTPS connection (requires HTTPS port).
